text: Lotto24, headquartered in Hamburg, Germany, is an online provider of state licensed lotteries. The company was founded in 2010 and brokers customer tickets to the 16 state-owned lottery companies of the country´s federal states, for which it receives a commission. The product range includes Lotto 6 aus49, Spiel 77, Super 6, Eurojackpot, GlücksSpirale, lotto clubs, Keno and Deutsche Fernsehlotterie. Lotto24's shares have been traded on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2012. As of 31 December 2016, there were 24,154,890 issued shares. == History == Lotto24 was founded in Hamburg in 2010. The company was formed when the current Zeal Network SE span off its German business. It went public on 3 July 2012 and its shares have since been listed in the Prime Standard segment of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange. Shortly before its IPO, the second State Treaty on Games of Chance (Glückspielstaatsvertrag - GlüStV) came into effect in Germany on 1 July 2012 which repealed the ban on online marketing of state lotteries included in the first GlüStV (2008). Lotto24 was one of the first private providers to receive a state permit for the marketing of online lotteries in September 2012. This was followed by a permit for TV and online advertising in March 2013. Both permits were prolonged in 2017. In 2014, Lotto24 released mobile applications for iOS and Android which enable lotto players to submit their tickets via smartphone and tablet. ==Finances == In its fiscal year 2016, Lotto24 AG posted billings of €200.5 million and revenues of €22.7 million. Compared to 2015, these figures represent growth of 47 percent and 68 percent, respectively. The number of customers rose from 883,000 in 2015 to 1,282,000 in 2016 passing the one- million-mark in April 2016. According to information supplied by the German Lottery Association, the company is the market leader in online lottery sales with a market share of the German online segment of 31 percent. In 2016, online lottery revenues amounted to €650 million. This represents around nine percent of the total lottery market with stakes of €7.3 billion. == Services == Lotto24 is a licensed provider of state lotteries via the internet.
